name: .SMS File Extension
summary: Learn about .SMS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: ROM image of an original Sega Master System (SMS) video game; contains the same data stored on the actual game cartridge; can be played on a Mac or PC using SMS emulation software.

content: The original Sega console was called the Sega Master System (SMS). It was released shortly after the original Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).
NOTE: MESS and MacMESS can be used to load SMS games, but you need a valid ROM system image in order to load them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
